name: English Teacher
description:
ABOUT US

YEP Turkey (Yabancı Dil Eğitim Programı Türkiye) is a joint project of TÜGVA (Turkish Youth Foundation) and Turkish Ministry of Education aiming to unite global English teachers with young learners of English by creating an international English training setting for both parties in Istanbul, Turkey.

YEP Turkey is a Teacher Training Academy - providing a guaranteed job contract via Turkish Ministry of Education (including work permit) for those who have few or no work experience in English teaching in Istanbul.

JOB DESCRIPTION

  • We are hiring new graduate English teachers who have few or no job experience in English teaching to be employed in Istanbul.,
  • YEP Turkey is also favorable for experienced teachers who like to build new techniques and increase their teaching skills.
  • We will train you with GET Certificate Program (Global English Teacher) – an internationally recgonized TEFL Certificate and accredited by City & Guilds, UK – and then employ you at our public schools.
  • The monthly salary for this role is 4,000 Turkish Lira Gross. The candidates will have suitable accommodation options, work permit, residence permit and insurance as well.
